analysis.description:
DigitizeCoin.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/24/0xfa1ba7dbb7b20439e75ca45173cf45c95a9301ea.sol#288-300) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ApproveAndCallFallBack(_recipient).receiveApproval(msg.sender,_value,address(this),_data) (/unique_chucks/24/0xfa1ba7dbb7b20439e75ca45173cf45c95a9301ea.sol#295-298)

DigitizeCoin.withdrawERC20Tokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xfa1ba7dbb7b20439e75ca45173cf45c95a9301ea.sol#348-356) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,totalBalance) (/unique_chucks/24/0xfa1ba7dbb7b20439e75ca45173cf45c95a9301ea.sol#352-353)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/24/0xfa1ba7dbb7b20439e75ca45173cf45c95a9301ea.sol#91-100) should be declared external
